name: Haus Neuner
description: Our family run bed and breakfast is situated about 2km outside of Mayrhofen surrounded by nature. The four rustically furnished double rooms are all equipped with a balcony (sunshine from 9.00 to 10.00hr), with a wonderful view of Mayrhofen and the majestic mountains of Zillertal, as well as shared shower and separate WC facilities. A pleasant sun terrace and well tended garden with deck chairs, and a breakfast room is also available for our guest's use.
The price includes local taxes and breakfast.

Our house is situated approx 2km before Mayrhofen on the left side of the valley. Go through Ramsau (where there are traffic lights) and after 1,5km  there is a round about. Take the second drive and turn right. After app. 600m is a small side road with brown house signs. Turn left and then left again up a small hill. The next house on this road is ours. Our house is directly next door to the "Eckertauerhof".

makesOffer.name: Double room, running hot/cold water
makesOffer.description: Comfortably furnished double room in a rustical style. Large, sunny balcony with a fabulous view of the Zillertaler mountains.

itemOffered.name: double room with running hot/cold water
